categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Altratonne was an engagement between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Alliance forces under Commander Lav Bilsek engaged the Imperial garrison on Altratonne in order to disrupt the HoloNet relay in the sector.
The Rebels first attacked the power generator. A second strike team then seized the landing bay. A third strike team infiltrates the back way and encounters Imperial surveyors.
